title.narrative: Relief Support to Household Affected by Insurgency in Askira/Uba LGA of Borno State

description.narrative: The project seeks to improve food security and to reduce negative coping strategies in 2 camps, Garin Galang Camp and Wandeo camp in Askira Uba LGA, Borno State. The project will work with 3660 (2560 women, 1100 men) vulnerable IDP and Host Community members including at least 7% (256) people living with disabilities. Outcome 1: 610 Households will be given unconditional cash grants for a value of N 4,500 per capita/month. Each tranche has been calculated as the 70% of the Minimum Expenditure Basket (MEB) for food emergency needs per capita/per month. Each household will be given a pre-paid card that will work as an e-Wallet. Tranches for each household will be calculated depending on the number of people in the household, this is N4,500 * N household members = transfer value. This value will be distributed in the third month and fifth month of the project. In total each beneficiary will receive N 9,000. The Food Consumption Score (FCS) will be used to capture this improvements. Outcome 2, the project will also train 22 farmer groups on Good Agronomic Practices (GAP) in order to improve their farming activities. To achieve this, the project will distribute agricultural inputs and tools for 440 farmers (representing 440 hh).
